WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I'd like to have a setting to Auto-reconnect at Startup to the last used Server.

Regards
Norbert

Comments.Message:
Hum, looks like I will need a german translation for this sentence :
> Connect to the last used Server when starting.

Made a Option in Tools: 
[X] Reconnect to the last used WSUS when starting WPP.

But take care, if the Server not available, send a Messagebox, don't let crash WPP. ;)

[X] Zum zuletzt verwendeten WSUS wieder verbinden, beim Start von WPP.

Beim Start automatisch zum zuletzt verwendeten WSUS verbinden

It Sounds better and needs less space. ;)
OK, of course, it is your feature request. :)
:) ok, we can Look for better working. But not today. ;)
